    <p>Amazing. This is Paolo Uccello’s wireframe rendering of a chalice in the year
1450 – right around the time when perspective was being invented.</p>

<p><img src="http://www.edwardbenson.com/images/posts/uccello.jpg" alt="Uccello's Chalice" /></p>

<p>To think that the birth of the Renaissance would look so much like the birth of
computer graphics..</p>
